title: Has a woman been tried for laughing during Jeff's stabilization hearing?
subtitle: Desiree Firuz, a member of the Pink Code protest group, was accused of disorderly conduct after laughing during the presentation of Attorney General Jeff's candidate for hearings.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The pink code member Desiree Ferrose was prosecuted for disorderly behavior after laughing during the DA's confirmation hearing.
